title: promotion_reviewed
description: This event is triggered whenever a customer reviews a product. The following properties are supported by this event

product_id.description: Contains the ID of the product being reviewed

review_id.description: Contains the unique ID of the review being posted by the customer

review_body.description: Contains the body or the content of the review posted by the customer

rating.description: Contains the rating of the product added by the customer in the review
